pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 关于我学生。一个自闭且无趣的人。兴趣非常广泛，各个圈子均有涉猎但都涉及不深。拖延成性，改不了。 关于本站几年之前就有用hexo搭过blog，不过那时是在虚拟机上搭的，当时的配置也已经找不到了。于是重新搭了一个，用来记录一些自己想记录的东西。

posts.title: 建站的一些思路和Hexo的部分简单指令
posts.text: 前言前端时间想对自己学到的东西和一些脑洞进行记录，便想起了几年前搭好就放着吃灰的bolg。无奈之前是在虚拟机上搭建的hexo环境，换电脑后没有刻意保存，自然也找不回来了。于是我尝试在Mac上重新用Hexo进行搭建。不得不说，几年前的记忆都已经模糊了，碰过的一些坑又再次踩了上去。所以在此把Hexo建站的大概流程记录一下，以备后用。 搭建Hexo环境1.npm直接安装hexo1npm install hexo-cli -g 2.初始化Hexo1hexo init bolg 3.GitHub创建仓库并绑定SSH创建仓库略过。本地绑定github： 12git config --global user.name "yourname"git config --global user.email "youremail" 创建ssh密匙 1ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail" 然后进入生成的文件夹 1cd .ssh 复制id_rsa.pub，进入github的Setting中，在SSH keys选项内，点击New SSH key，粘贴。 4.部署hexo至github打开站点主目录下的_config.yml，找到deploy项，修改为： 1234deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/YourgithubName/YourgithubName.github.io.git branch: master 然后使用npm安装deploy-git: 1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 最后： 12hexo cleanhexo d -g 即可部署。 目前使用的站点配置文件与主题站点： 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283# Hexo Configuration## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/# Sitetitle: My Worldsubtitle: description:keywords:author: DwChylanguage: zh-CNtimezone:# URL## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'url: http://dwchy.github.ioroot: /permalink: :title/permalink_defaults:# Directorysource_dir: sourcepublic_dir: publictag_dir: tagsarchive_dir: archivescategory_dir: categoriescode_dir: downloads/codei18n_dir: :langskip_render:# Writingnew_post_name: :title.md # File name of new postsdefault_layout: posttitlecase: false # Transform title into titlecaseexternal_link: true # Open external links in new tabfilename_case: 0render_drafts: falsepost_asset_folder: falserelative_link: falsefuture: truehighlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: false tab_replace: # Home page setting# path: Root path for your blogs index page. (default = '')# per_page: Posts displayed per page. (0 = disable pagination)# order_by: Posts order. (Order by date descending by default)index_generator: path: '' per_page: 10 order_by: -date # Category & Tagdefault_category: uncategorizedcategory_map:tag_map:# Date / Time format## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date## You can customize the date format as defined in## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/date_format: YYYY-MM-DDtime_format: HH:mm:ss# Pagination## Set per_page to 0 to disable paginationper_page: 10pagination_dir: page# Extensions## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/theme: icarus# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.htmldeploy: type: git repository: https://github.com/DwChy/dwchy.github.io branch: master 主题：使用的是icarus主题，安装只需将主题下载至theme文件夹（其他主题亦同）: 1git clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus themes/icarus
